title: Beautiful 2nd floor, 2-bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment for rent in Cleve
posting_body: Beautiful 2nd floor, 2-bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment for rent in Cleveland with gorgeous sunporch for rent in nice quiet neighborhood.
wh o will reside in the apartment is required to complete a separate application.2nd floor and available JULY 22, 2022.
Due to prior experience, if you do not have a credit score above 400, please do not apply.
The apartment has spacious bedrooms with lots of closets, new kitchen will be completed by August 1st, newer heating system with economical gas heat, and newer windows.
Additionally, there is a porch and a yard for tenant use.
The rent is $700.00 per month plus one-month security.
Off Street parking for up to 2 cars is available.
Locked storage in the basement is included.
The apartment is located one block from Main Street and the elementary school.
Some pets are allowed depending on breed and owner’s approval.
If the ad is still posted then the unit is still available.
